PENDING.description: Property.  The goal has yet to be processed by the action server

ACTIVE.description: Property.  The goal is currently being processed by the action server

PREEMPTED.description: Property.  The goal received a cancel request after it started executing

SUCCEEDED.description: Property.    and has since completed its execution (Terminal State)  The goal was achieved successfully by the action server (Terminal State)

ABORTED.description: Property.  The goal was aborted during execution by the action server due

REJECTED.description: Property.     to some failure (Terminal State)  The goal was rejected by the action server without being processed,

PREEMPTING.description: Property.     because the goal was unattainable or invalid (Terminal State)  The goal received a cancel request after it started executing

RECALLING.description: Property.     and has not yet completed execution  The goal received a cancel request before it started executing,

RECALLED.description: Property.     but the action server has not yet confirmed that the goal is canceled  The goal received a cancel request before it started executing

LOST.description: Property.     and was successfully cancelled (Terminal State)  An action client can determine that a goal is LOST. This should not be

text.description: Property.     sent over the wire by an action server llow for the user to associate a string with GoalStatus for debugging
